Finding Expression Data with GEOmetadb Welcome

Finding Expression Data with GEOmetadb Ruth Isserlin 2026-02-03 Welcome This book is a tutorial-style rewrite of a lecture on where to find expression data and how to mine GEO metadata with the GEOmetadb package. It is designed for fourth-year bioinformatics students and focuses on reproducible code that you can run as-is. If youâ€™re new to bookdown, install it with: install.packages("bookdown") Then build this book by running in R: bookdown::render_book(".")
